content:
Just read the news that Michael Boardman passed away yesterday.

We are sorry to share the sad news that emeritus professor Michael Boardman passed away peacefully this morning. Mike was a giant of modern homotopy theory and a wonderful friend and colleague, and we will miss him.

- JHU Mathematics (@JHUmath)

Here's what Peter May wrote on occasion of Boardman's 60th birthday.
Ugh! Operads, props and quasicategories owe so much to his book with Vogt!
He was one of my teachers at Hopkins, a long time ago now. I didn't know him well, but he was very kind.
